featured.text: Hseu Fang-yi, a young Taiwanese dancer, recently _____ at Lincoln Center in New York and won a great deal of praise.

definition.zh_def: 獠牙；尖牙，通常指肉食性動物的長牙。
definition.en_def: A long, pointed tooth, especially one used for biting or tearing, typically found in carnivorous animals.
definition.example: The wolf bared its fangs as a warning to intruders.
